content: hello to install os security updates on ubuntu can i just do sudo apt upgrade then sudo reboot?

(Please start a new topic if you're asking a new question. :smile:

Yes, you can. Though, in most cases, a full reboot isn't necessary; if a service if updated, Ubuntu will restart it as part of the upgrade.

You may be interested in our documentation for Ubuntu unattended-upgrades:
https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/troubleshooting.html?highlight=unattended-upgrade#restrict-unattended-upgrades
